Module io.ciera.runtime.api
Package io.ciera.runtime.api.domain

Interface Domain

All Superinterfaces:
ActionHome, EventTarget, InstancePopulation
All Known Subinterfaces:
PersistentDomain
public interface Domain extends ActionHome, InstancePopulation, EventTarget
A domain is a composite of translated model elements including classes, relationships, types, functions, etc. The component provides access to out-bound (required) interface messages and the instance population for every action within it.
